original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: School's Out for Summer
overview: What four words mean as much fun as Alvin and the Chipmunks? School's Out for Summer, of course! Put them together, add a double helping of hilarious stories, great rock songs performed by The Chipmunks, and you're got hot summer fun ... all year round!
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: School's Out for Summer
